welcome_message_body: Welcome to Iringa, Tanzania! Known for its beautiful landscapes and rich cultural heritage, we invite you to explore our charming city and experience all it has to offer. Enjoy your time here!

restaurants.name: Mama Iringa Italian Pizzeria & Restaurant
restaurants.description: Mama Iringa Italian Pizzeria & Restaurant is a italian restaurant located in Iringa.

restaurants.name: Lulu's Café
restaurants.description: Lulu's Café is a diner located in the city.

restaurants.name: Comfort-Kitonga
restaurants.description: Comfort-Kitonga is a restaurant located in the city.

restaurants.name: Babanusa restaurant
restaurants.description: Babanusa restaurant is a african restaurant located in the city.

restaurants.name: Hasty Tasty
restaurants.description: Hasty Tasty is a bistro located in Iringa.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Nduli Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Nduli Airport is responsible for handling all freight and cargo shipments.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
